word: WHEN WE REACHED THOSE CHAPTERS RELATING TO THE REFORMATION IN GERMANY AND FRANCE, THE TRANSLATORS WOULD COMMENT ON THE APPROPRIATENESS OF THE SELECTION OF HISTORICAL EVENTS WHICH SISTER WHITE HAD CHOSEN, AND IN TWO INSTANCES WHICH I REMEMBER, THEY SUGGESTED THAT THERE WERE OTHER EVENTS OF CORRESPONDING IMPORTANCE WHICH SHE HAD NOT MENTIONED. WHEN THIS WAS BROUGHT TO HER ATTENTION, SHE REQUESTED THAT THE HISTORIES BE BROUGHT TO HER THAT SHE MIGHT CONSIDER THE IMPORTANCE OF THE EVENTS WHICH HAD BEEN MENTIONED. THE READING OF THE HISTORY REFRESHED TO HER MIND THAT WHICH SHE HAD SEEN, AFTER WHICH SHE WROTE A DESCRIPTION OF THE EVENT.
